title: Lucifer, Vol. 10: Morningstar
description: The war in Heaven reaches its universe-shaking conclusion in MORNINGSTAR, the tenth volume of writer Mike Carey's celebrated series. Collecting issues #62-69, MORNINGSTAR gathers together the forces of Heaven, Hell, and everyone in between for a final battle to determine the fate of both Yahweh and Lucifer's Creations â€” a fate no one, not even the Lightbringer, could foresee.
author: Mike Carey
